hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Market Shooting Gallery Reward: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Did you know that you can tune a piano but you can't tune a fish?

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #the enemy souls of the Grottos# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a medium-sized fish (adult)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #3# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a medium-sized fish (adult)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.
hinted_locations: Hideout Break Room Hall to Balcony Wonderitem

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Epona's Song#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Forest Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Hylian Loach# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Forest Trial Eye Switch Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Fire Temple#.
